scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const vitePath = 'public/build/.vite/manifest.json'; const targetPath = 'public/build/manifest.json'; if (fs.existsSync(vitePath) && !fs.existsSync(targetPath)) { fs.copyFileSync(vitePath, targetPath); console.log('Manifest copied from .vite to build root'); }"
